author: Staff Reporter
text:
Four persons were killed and four others injured when the Mahindra Scorpio car they were travelling in rammed a private bus at Veppur on Saturday. The deceased were identified as Krishnan (70), Sathappan (60), Ponnazhagi (52) and Azhagurani (45), all hailing from Vellalakottai in Pudukottai district.

Police said Krishnan and his relatives were returning to their native village after attending a marriage in Chennai.

As they approached the Veppur bus stand a private bus in front of the car suddenly swerved to the right. The car driver Saravanan (40) lost control of the vehicle and rammed the bus. While Krishnan, Sathappan and Ponnazhagi died on the spot Azhagurani succumbed to injuries in the Perambalur Government Hospital.

A case has been registered and enquiries are on.
title: Four killed in accident
